snippet: European countries agreed in principle to impose an embargo on Iran’s oil, diplomats said, their most aggressive move yet in the tense standoff with Iran over its nuclear program.
abstract: European countries, in their most aggressive move yet in the tense standoff with Iran over its nuclear program, agree in principle to impose an embargo on Iranian oil; final decision by the European Union will be carried out in stages to avoid major disruptions in global oil supplies.

byline.contributor: James Kanter contributed reporting from Brussels.

lead_paragraph: European countries agreed in principle to impose an embargo on Iran’s oil, diplomats said, their most aggressive move yet in the tense standoff with Iran over its nuclear program.

headline.seo: In Bold Step, Europe Nears Embargo on Iran Oil
headline.main: Europe Takes Bold Step Toward a Ban on Iranian Oil
headline.print_headline: In Bold Step, Europe Nears Embargo on Iran Oil
